p: There were large differences in the free radical scavenging activity of the essential oils from four species of Schisandra ( Table 3). The free radical scavenging activity of essential oils could be due to their higher content of sesquiterpenes and oxygenated sesquiterpenes components, which were isocaryophyllene, isospathulenol, Î±-muurolene, and longiverbenone according to the GC-MS analysis ( Table S4).
